short.ja: あなたの安全な身分証明書保管庫
short.th: อุโมงค์ประจำตัวที่ปลอดภัยของคุณ
short.vi: Vòm nhận dạng bảo mật của bạn

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ixo Keysafe is your secure connection to the ixo blockchain.

Keysafe holds your self-sovereign digital identifier and private cryptographic keys within your browser, locally on your computer. This enables you to securely sign messages and transact with ixo protocol blockchains.

All messages and transactions are displayed by the Keysafe so you can be sure of what you are signing.

Your data and privacy are protected by this tool and your keys are always in your hands.
